backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Help me understand where I am spending my time and identify ways I can reclaim time to focus more on my top priorities.

gutts.name: Analyze Time Usage
gutts.capability: Collect and analyze the user's time-tracking data to produce a detailed breakdown of how time is currently spent.
gutts.user_goal: Understand the distribution of their time across activities.
gutts.evidence: Help me understand where I am spending my time.

gutts.name: Identify Time-Wasting Activities
gutts.capability: Detect low-value or inefficient activities that consume significant time.
gutts.user_goal: Identify areas where time could be saved or optimized.
gutts.evidence: identify ways I can reclaim time

gutts.name: Recommend Time Reclamation Strategies
gutts.capability: Propose actionable strategies to reduce time spent on low-value tasks and increase focus on high-value work.
gutts.evidence: identify ways I can reclaim time

gutts.name: Align Strategies with Top Priorities
gutts.capability: Ensure that the recommended time-saving actions are directly tied to the user's top priorities.
gutts.user_goal: Focus more on top priorities by aligning reclaimed time with them.
gutts.evidence: focus more on my top priorities.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
